text:
i understand and have put proper patch into place but this error keeps happening
and im having problems using ctrl-c in closing apache down.

And thus closing it harshly has made this error and there also is problem with
another kernal error but heres the exact error

APACHE caused an invalid page fault in
module LIBAPR.DLL at 0177:6eec7373.
Registers:
EAX=00000001 CS=0177 EIP=6eec7373 EFLGS=00010246
EBX=00000000 SS=017f ESP=01dafb90 EBP=6ee61040
ECX=00000000 DS=017f ESI=00000000 FS=56f7
EDX=ffffff00 ES=017f EDI=006a0de0 GS=0000
Bytes at CS:EIP:
8b 2e 8b 46 08 85 c9 74 0a 3b c2 76 06 89 1e 8b 
Stack dump:
6ee61040 00000000 00000000 0065e904 00000000 08cdb1b4 6ff08288 00000001 0065e56c
0065e90c 00000000 0000001a 0065e92c 0065e56c 1218848c 1218848f
creator: chronosss@rogers.com
nd@perlig.de
text:
I believe that may happen, if the dll is cached or not properly installed.
Anyway, does the problem persist in the current version (2.0.45)? Should not :)

and sorry for the delayed response ...

No further response. Assuming issue resolved.

Please reopen the bug if this is not the case and you can provide additional
information.

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: nd@perlig.de
